com.github.tilastokeskus.matertis.core

Class ScoreHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.tilastokeskus.matertis.core.AbstractScoreHandler
      • com.github.tilastokeskus.matertis.core.ScoreHandler

  • public class ScoreHandler
extends AbstractScoreHandler
    Defines a default way of determining the current score of a game. After an amount of lines are cleared, the scoring is determined as follows:
    • 1 line cleared: 1 * (level + 1)
    • 2 lines cleared: 3 * (level + 1)
    • 3 lines cleared: 5 * (level + 1)
    • 4 lines cleared: 8 * (level + 1)
    Author:
    tilastokeskus
